body.text: Use Copilot where work already lives: email, docs, meetings, and files. Ask for a first draft - then refine.

facts.title: Outlook
facts.value: "Draft a friendly reply. Confirm the date and ask for agenda items."

facts.title: Teams
facts.value: "Summarize this chat: decisions, risks, and next steps."

facts.title: Word
facts.value: "Turn these notes into a 1-page brief with headings and bullets."

facts.title: PowerPoint
facts.value: "Create 6 slides from this outline. Add speaker notes."

facts.title: Excel
facts.value: "Explain what's driving the dip in sales and suggest 3 actions."

body.text:
• Name the file/thread/meeting you mean.
• Specify tone ("executive", "friendly", "direct").
• Ask for *options*: "Give 2 versions—short and detailed."
• Finish with a check: "What are the assumptions?"
Reminder: always review before sending - you're the decision-maker.
